attributes.action: Award Elaine Paige with a Damehood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Elaine Paige has worked constantly in the British and worldwide theatres for over 35 years,winning many awards. Miss Paige has also released over 20 Albums during her long career, most going both Gold and Platinum. She also is patron of many charities in the UK and worldwide.
